column4: Hey, I'm having problems running gdmsetup. I get this output when I try to run it: http://rafb.net/paste/results/AM1my641.html
I see several people having trouble on the forums with no answer on how to fix it... any ideas here?
are all the posts you saw on the forums very recent?
check /etc/gdm/gdm.conf too since I'm not sure what it uses
hmm... strange.  I've seen this once before but it was because the user had kdm running instead of gdm.  Are you running this with 'sudo gdmsetup'?
ok is xdm or kdm running?
doh, get to #ubuntu+1 for edgy support please :)
